thread.title: Farmer Boys Launches Annual Fundraising Campaign
thread.title_full: Farmer Boys Launches Annual Fundraising Campaign - CBS News 8 - San Diego, CA News Station - KFMB Channel 8

author: cbs8
title: Farmer Boys Launches Annual Fundraising Campaign
text:
Farmer Boys
Farmer Boys and Loma Linda University Children's Hospital help provide care for children in need
RIVERSIDE, Calif. , Oct. 14, 2015 /PRNewswire/ -- Farmer Boys announced the launch of its 15 th annual fundraiser benefitting the Loma Linda University Children's Hospital (LLUCH). The campaign will take place at participating Farmer Boys locations through November 8 .
For a $1 donation, guests will be recognized as Champions for Children. A Heart of Champion donation slip will be displayed for each donor at Farmer Boys restaurants during the fundraiser. Farmer Boys will reward the generosity of patrons supporting the LLUCH fundraiser with special fundraiser vouchers.
"At Farmer Boys, we are touched by countless stories from our employees and patrons who have experienced firsthand the highest level of medical care performed by the medical team at LLUCH," said Karen Eadon , President/COO of Farmer Boys. "Visit your local Farmer Boys to be a Champion for Children and donate today."
Since 2000, Farmer Boys has donated over $435,000 to LLUCH. Every dollar collected helps provide world-class clinical care and outreach programs for children. Donations also fund research in youth health and wellness delivering on the promise of a healthier future today for children in the region and beyond.
About Farmer Boys
Headquartered in Riverside, California , Farmer Boys is a fast casual restaurant chain founded in 1981 serving award-winning burgers, specialty sandwiches, crisp salads, signature sides, and all-day breakfast. Farmer Boys currently operates 84 restaurants in California and Nevada . For more information, visit http://www.farmerboys.com .
